creditline: Gift of Margaret V. B. Wurtele
description: standing male figure with brown hair in monk's cut, with a slightly smiling mouth, wearing a blue robe with a light blue collar and hood lining, with a white and black belt; man holds a rattan cross in his PR hand and holds the Christ child, with long brown hair, wearing a red robe, over his PL arm
title: San Antonio
